comments:
I20031210

I tried to open an old workspace using this build.  The workspace hadn't been
opened in a couple of months.  The platform fails to start, giving the following
exception:

Could you try to open this workspace with M5
This appears to be fixed in I20031216.  I can now reopen all of my old workspaces.
Marking as invalid since without changing our code it worked.

Although I can no longer reproduce, another user is reporting the same stack
trace using I20031216.  See bug 48877.
